## Lodging

We have a room block at the [Graduate Hotel](https://www.graduatehotels.com/east-lansing/){target="_blank"} in downtown East Lansing.  



********************************************************************************
## Transit

If traveling by air, we recommend flying into [Detroit or Lansing airports](https://www.google.com/travel/flights?q=Flights%20to%20Lansing%20on%202023-08-18%20through%202023-08-20){target="_blank"}.

The [Michigan Flyer](https://www.michiganflyer.com){target="_blank"} bus runs between the Detroit airport and East Lansing (9 trips daily).
